name: Global Languages Hawaiʻi
address: (Specific address not readily available, operates on Oʻahu)
description: Offers Arabic language courses, taught by native speakers with advanced degrees. They also provide consultation services and integrated courses combining language with art, music, play, and cultural immersion

name: Language Trainers
description: Provides one-on-one business and general Arabic courses in Honolulu, tailored to individual needs. They also offer small group and in-company courses
services: Arabic-speaking Technical training in Hawaii consultation

name: Listen & Learn USA
description: Offers face-to-face one-on-one or small group general and business Arabic lessons in Honolulu. Courses are flexible and can be scheduled at the student's convenience
services: Arabic-speaking Technical training in Hawaii consultation

name: University of Hawaiʻi Community Colleges (Kapiʻolani Community College)
description: While not exclusively technical training, the University of Hawaiʻi system offers Arabic language courses, such as "LANG3106 Basic Arabic Language and Culture" at Kapiʻolani Community College. These courses focus on language and cultural aspects
services: Arabic-speaking Technical training in Hawaii consultation

name: Wyzant Tutors
